PHRASE.LANG: Bundles together all the Fantasy furniture pieces, including all six gargoyles, the Crystal Ball, Astrolabe, and Old Cauldron.[#Legal]
Comprend tous les meubles fantastiques, c'est à dire les six gargouilles, la boule de cristal, l'astrolabe et le vieux chaudron. [#Legal]
Enthält Kristallkugel, Astrolabium, alten Kessel, und alle sechs Wasserspeier. [#Legal]
Il pacchetto comprende la sfera di cristallo, l'astrolabio, l'antico calderone e il pacchetto gargoyle. [#Legal]
Reúne la bola de cristal, el astrolabio, el viejo caldero, y las gárgolas.[#Legal]
Bundles together all the Fantasy furniture pieces, including all six gargoyles, the Crystal Ball, Astrolabe, and Old Cauldron.[#Legal]
수정구, 천문 관측기, 오래된 가마솥, 그리고 여섯 종류의 가고일 역시 포함됩니다.[#Legal]
Bundles together all the Fantasy furniture pieces, including all six gargoyles, the Crystal Ball, Astrolabe, and Old Cauldron.[#Legal]
這款組合包是夢幻家具組合，包含六款滴水獸、水晶球、星盤、以及古典大甕。[#Legal]
